GR13jssivppu:1: dvārasyārcanayāgadhāmagatavighnodvāsanādyaiḥ prabhor yaḥ śrīmānyajanaṃ karoti bhavatastasyaiva siddhidvayam // JsSpst_1 //
GR13jssivppu:2: ekaivārthata īśaśaktiramitā yānekarūpā śivā kālopādhivaśāddvijāstvanudinaṃ brāhmyādirūpeṇa tām /
GR13jssivppu:3: dhyāyantyatra tu nirmalātmaśivayoḥ sandhiśca śaivī purā sandhyātaḥ śiva eva sādhakavarairdhyeyaḥ sadā nirmalaḥ // JsSpst_2 //
GR13jssivppu:5: dhyeyaṃ sadā munivarairapavargasiddhyai viśvātmakaṃ sadasadantamanantamīśam // JsSpst_3 //
GR13jssivppu:7: śambhuṃ sadoditamamāyaviyatsvarūpaṃ kodaṇḍamadhyanilayaṃ niyataṃ smarāmi // JsSpst_4 //
GR13jssivppu:9: bodhāmṛtaṃ karaṇakāraṇakāryahīnaṃ taṃ brahmarandhranilayaṃ niyataṃ smarāmi // JsSpst_5 //
GR13jssivppu:14: āyāmaiḥ śvanasya bhautikamalaṃ dehaṃ kalābhiḥ sudhīr yaḥ pañcādhvavisarpiṇībhiraniśaṃ saṃśodhya tacchambaraiḥ /
GR13jssivppu:15: mantrālaṅkṛtadehabhṛnniśi divā sandhyāsu santoṣayann arcāhomasamādhibhiḥ śivamasau saṃyāti śaivaṃ padam // JsSpst_8 //
GR13jssivppu:16: ya eṣa devo mahato mahīyān aṇoraṇīyānbhavabhīrubhiḥ saḥ /
GR13jssivppu:17: jñeyaḥ śivaḥ sarvagataḥ śarīre dhyeyaḥ sa pūjyaḥ śivaliṅgamadhye // JsSpst_9 //
GR13jssivppu:18: hṛtpadmākhyaśivālaye manasije tatkarṇikākhye kriyāpīṭhe jñānamayaṃ viśuddhamanasā saṃsthāpya nādātmanā /
GR13jssivppu:19: liṅgaṃ tacca sudhāmayena payasā saṃsnāpya samyakpuno vairāgyeṇa ca candanena vasubhiḥ puṣpairahiṃsādibhiḥ // JsSpst_10 //
GR13jssivppu:20: prāṇāyāmabhavena dhūpavidhinā ciddīpadānena yaḥ pratyāhāramayena somahaviṣā sauṣumnajāpena ca /
GR13jssivppu:21: taccitte bahudhāraṇābhiramaladhyānodbhavairbhūṣaṇais tatsāmyāṇinivedanena yajate dhanyaḥ sa evāmalaḥ // JsSpst_11 //
GR13jssivppu:22: candrasrāvisudhāmayena haviṣā nābhisthakuṇḍe 'nalaṃ santarpyeśamayaṃ śivāspadagatavyomni sthite sarvage /
GR13jssivppu:23: kandodbhūtaśivāṇunādaśikhayā vṛttyātmasaṃvedanaṃ śaive jyotiṣi yaḥ karoti puruṣo muktaḥ sa evākṣayaḥ // JsSpst_12 //
GR13jssivppu:27: gātrakaṃ chadanadvayaṃ kamalaṃ sakesarakarṇikaṃ śaktimaṇḍalasaṅghayuktamahaṃ namāmi śivāsanam // JsSpst_14 //
GR13jssivppu:31: tatra sthitaṃ hṛdayamantragatātmamantra- mūrtiṃ ca bindugatamīśamahaṃ namāmi // JsSpst_16 //
GR13jssivppu:32: tatkandaṃ śatakoṭiyojanamitaṃ nālaṃ parārdhāntakaṃ granthiḥ koṭiparārdhapaścimasahasro 'bjaṃ ca tallakṣakam /*
GR13jssivppu:33: mūrtistasya ca koṭirīśvaramayī tasyārbudasyārbudāmbhojaṃ mantramayaṃ sadāśivavapustadvānameyaḥ śivaḥ // JsSpst_17 //*
GR13jssivppu:34: yasyāmauṣadhabhūṣaṇadhvanimayī mūrtiḥ parā baindavī dhyeyā śaṅkaramantratantraniratairjñānakriyāṅgī śivā /
GR13jssivppu:35: sarvaiśvaryasukhapradā nirupamā sādāśivī nirmalā nādākhyāya sadāśivāya mahate śāntāya tasmai namaḥ // JsSpst_18 //
GR13jssivppu:39: bhūtāmbhorāśisiddhismarabhujagakalākḷptadehaḥ kriyecchā- dṛṅmāsārdhāmbakaṃ taṃ kabilagatamahaṃ naumi vidyāśarīram // JsSpst_20 //
GR13jssivppu:42: īśānena viyanmayena dhavalaprakhyena sarvaprabhor vyāptaṃ vaktracatuṣṭayaṃ puruṣahṛdguhyājamantrātmakam /
GR13jssivppu:43: tenedaṃ dhavalaprabhaṃ śivavidaḥ pūrvādikāṣṭhābhṛtāṃ varṇānugrahahetutaḥ pratimukhaṃ pītādivarṇaṃ viduḥ // JsSpst_22 //
GR13jssivppu:48: bodhānandamayī vibhorbhavabhayapradhvaṃsakṛcchaktayas tisrastāḥ pariṇāmataśca vivṛtirniḥśeṣabījasya hi /
GR13jssivppu:49: tapūrṇaṃ prakṛtiḥ kalādyabhimukhī dīrghākṣasūtraṃ manaḥ śambhorastranikāya āgamaparairjñeyaḥ paro nāparaḥ // JsSpst_25 //
GR13jssivppu:55: (this half-line appears to be unmetrical āryā)
GR13jssivppu:57: vāmaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ raudraṃ kalavikaraṇaṃ balavikaraṇaṃ kāntam /*
GR13jssivppu:59: (this half-line appears to be unmetrical āryā)
GR13jssivppu:61: (this half-line appears to be unmetrical āryā)
GR13jssivppu:64: bodhānandamayāya sarvavibhave nityāya viśvātmane śuddhāyāmalatejase ca mahate tasmai parasmai namaḥ // JsSpst_31 //
GR13jssivppu:66: darśaneṣukarāṃśabhāvamitonmanī paramāsanaṃ yasya taṃ praṇato 'smi niṣkalamavyayaṃ paramaṃ śivam // JsSpst_32 //
GR13jssivppu:68: sāṃśumattriśikhadvibimbagatadvikubjaga unmanā pātu vaḥ sakalāparaḥ sakalākalaḥ sakalaḥ śivaḥ // JsSpst_33 //
GR13jssivppu:70: śaṅkaraṃ vasusāgarāṅgulacāriṇaṃ rasaśūnyagaṃ sarvamantrapatiṃ prāsādamahaṃ nato 'smi ṣaḍadhvagam // JsSpst_34 //
GR13jssivppu:73: āvāhanaṃ svātmani citprakāśas tatra sthitiḥ sthāpanamīśvarasya /*
GR13jssivppu:74: sānnidhyamātmeśvarasannidhānaṃ saṃrodhanaṃ svasya śive nirodhaḥ // JsSpst_36 //*
GR13jssivppu:81: snānaṃ svātmamalāpahaṃ śubhamayairgandhaiḥ samālepanaṃ sadvastrābharaṇaṃ sugandhikusumairmālābhirabhyarcanam /
GR13jssivppu:82: sālaṅkārasadāśivasya vidhivaddhūpapradānaṃ tvaṇor bhogārthaṃ hi sadeśadhāmni vimalaṃ dīpaṃ śivajñānadam // JsSpst_40 //
GR13jssivppu:88: bhogāṅgārcanamātmanaḥ śivaguṇaprāptyarthamaikyaṃ prabhor aṅgānāṃ punararcakasya śivasaṃyogāya śuddhātmanaḥ /
GR13jssivppu:89: tṛptasyānnanivedanāmbumukhavāsādipradānaṃ manas- tṛptyarthaṃ śivabhāvamaṅgalakaraṃ citraṃ tatrārcāphalam // JsSpst_42 //
GR13jssivppu:91: japaśca bhaktyā praṇatiḥ śivasya brahmendraviṣṇvādipadatvahetuḥ // JsSpst_43 //
GR13jssivppu:92: arcane sakalaṃ jape sakalākalaṃ satatoditaṃ niṣkalaṃ sakalādhvagaṃ paripūrṇamātmasamarpaṇe /
GR13jssivppu:93: vyomni susphaṭikaprabhaṃ bhavane kalāsahitaṃ haraṃ yo hi vetti paraṃ śivaṃ śiva eva so 'stra na saṃśayaḥ // JsSpst_44 //
GR13jssivppu:94: bhūyaḥ pūjanamīśasannidhikaraṃ samprārthanaṃ sveśayor anyonyaṃ tvavalokanāya bhuvane bhogāya sādāśive /
GR13jssivppu:95: īśāgnyarcanamarpaṇaṃ kṣapayituṃ bandhatrayaṃ karmaṇo jñeyaṃ svātmanivedanaṃ paraśive sthityarthamevātmanaḥ // JsSpst_45 //
GR13jssivppu:97: yasminnavasthānakaraṃ visargaṃ kurvansa śaivaṃ padamabhyupeti // JsSpst_46 //
GR13jssivppu:99: siddhāntajño jñānaśambhuḥ śivoktyā cakre bhaktyā bhuktaye muktaye ca // JsSpst_47 //
